thread.section_title: Spotahome opiniones | Opiniones de clientes sobre Spotahome | www.spotahome.com
thread.title: shrini iyer

author: shrini iyer
title: shrini iyer
text: In terms of customer service & so far as finding & booking a house is concerned, I am extremely satisfied with what i have experienced till now. However, the point to note is that i have not yet visited the house in person. I think the right time to provide an honest review would be after i take possession of the house i rented. Afterall, that is the end product i purchased through Spotahome & till the time i get what i paid for, i don't think the review would be complete.
